title: My family
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Education, Employment and Workplace Relations, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: My family are the most important people in the world and they will always be that.
description: To Malcolm Dotoi, his family includes what he would call his extended family, his cousins and grandfather. They provide support, guidance and inspiration and have helped him to develop into a youth leader. His grandfather, a tribal elder, has taught Malcolm about his connection to the land and to the spiritual world and how all these things have contributed to who Malcolm is today.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001903; This is me : foundation for young Australians (July 2009) : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
